document.full_text: hedge fund manager david einhorn, who is in talks to buy a large minority stake in the new york mets, could become a principal owner of the baseball team in three years, the new york times and espnnewyork.com reported on saturday.
document.title: einhorn may become majority owner of mets: reports
lines_and_colors: hedge fund manager david einhorn, who is in talks to buy a large minority stake in the new york mets, could become a principal owner of the baseball team in three years, the new york times and espnnewyork.com reported on saturday.
